abstract: The controversy over Facebook’s changes to its terms of service casts a spotlight on The Consumerist, the blog that set off the avalanche.
snippet: The controversy over Facebook’s changes to its terms of service casts a spotlight on The Consumerist, the blog that set off the avalanche.
lead_paragraph: By now, the three-day maelstrom surrounding Facebook’s effort to re-jigger its terms of service to give it more control over users’ content has settled down a bit: the social networking service restored the original language early Wednesday, and Mark Zuckerberg, Facebook’s chief executive, solicited the input of members to help draft a new set of rules.

headline.main: The Blog That Ignited a Privacy Debate on Facebook
